hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
sudo zypper update -y sudo zypper install -y git wget libicu-devel libboost_locale1_54_0 perl-Encode-Locale gcc-locale glibc-locale cat /etc/os-release
export hibernate_home=$(pwd) export JAVA_HOME=/opt/ibm/java-s390x-80 export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH
java -version
#Set Environmental variables export LANG=en_US.UTF-8 export JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS=-Dfile.encoding=UTF8 export _JAVA_OPTIONS="-Xmx10g"
#Download the source code sudo rm -rf hibernate-orm git clone git://github.com/hibernate/hibernate-orm.git cd hibernate-orm git checkout 5.2.10
mkdir -p $HOME/.gem/jruby/1.9
#Build Hibernate ./gradlew build -x :documentation:renderGettingStartedGuides -x :documentation:renderIntegrationGuide -x :documentation:renderUserGuide -x test
#Store known failures echo 'org.hibernate.jpa.test.criteria.nulliteral.CriteriaLiteralsTest > testCriteriaParameters FAILED org.hibernate.jpa.test.criteria.nulliteral.CriteriaLiteralsTest > testLiteralsInSelectClause FAILED org.hibernate.jpa.test.criteria.nulliteral.CriteriaLiteralsTest > testLiteralsInWhereClause FAILED org.hibernate.jpa.test.criteria.paths.SingularAttributeJoinTest > testEntityModeMapJoins FAILED org.hibernate.jpa.test.ejb3configuration.DisableDiscardPersistenceContextOnCloseTest > testDiscardOnClose FAILED org.hibernate.jpa.test.ejb3configuration.EnableDiscardPersistenceContextOnCloseTest > testDiscardOnClose FAILED org.hibernate.jpa.test.lock.StatementIsClosedAfterALockExceptionTest > testStatementIsClosed FAILED org.hibernate.test.boot.database.qualfiedTableNaming.NamespaceTest > testPhysicalNameSchemaAndCatalog FAILED org.hibernate.test.criteria.CriteriaQueryTest > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.insertordering.ElementCollectionTest > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.insertordering.InsertOrderingWithBidirectionalManyToMany > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.insertordering.InsertOrderingWithBidirectionalMapsIdOneToOne > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.insertordering.InsertOrderingWithBidirectionalOneToMany > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.insertordering.InsertOrderingWithBidirectionalOneToOne > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.insertordering.InsertOrderingWithJoinedTableInheritance > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.insertordering.InsertOrderingWithJoinedTableMultiLevelInheritance > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.insertordering.InsertOrderingWithSingleTableInheritance > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.insertordering.InsertOrderingWithTablePerClassInheritance > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.insertordering.InsertOrderingWithUnidirectionalOneToOne > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.jdbc.internal.SessionJdbcBatchTest > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.resource.transaction.jdbc.autocommit.H2SkipAutoCommitTest > test FAILED org.hibernate.test.timestamp.JdbcTimeCustomTimeZoneTest > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.timestamp.JdbcTimeDefaultTimeZoneTest > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.timestamp.JdbcTimestampCustomSessionLevelTimeZoneTest > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.timestamp.JdbcTimestampCustomTimeZoneTest > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.test.timestamp.JdbcTimestampDefaultTimeZoneTest > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.boot.model.process.internal.ScanningCoordinatorTest > classMethod FAILED org.hibernate.cfg.annotations.CollectionBinderTest > testAssociatedClassException FAILED org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.internal.JdbcCoordinatorTest > testConnectionClose FAILED :hibernate-core:test FAILED BUILD FAILED' > $HOME/known_failures
#Run the testsuite and compare failures ./gradlew test -Dtests.haltonfailure=false --continue test 2>&1 | tee $HOME/testlog
grep FAILED $HOME/testlog | tee $HOME/failures cat $HOME/failures diff -u --ignore-all-space <(sort $HOME/failures) <(sort $HOME/known_failures)
